Uses of Class
tripleplay.entity.Component

  • Packages that use Component 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.entity  

    • Uses of Component in tripleplay.entity

      Subclasses of Component in tripleplay.entity 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Component.FScalar
      A component implementation for a single scalar float.
      static class  Component.Generic<T>
      A component implementation for arbitrary objects.
      static class  Component.IMask
      A component implementation for a single int bit mask.
      static class  Component.IScalar
      A component implementation for a single scalar int.
      static class  Component.XY
      A component implementation for a pair of floats.
      Methods in tripleplay.entity with parameters of type Component 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Entity Entity.add(Component comp)
      Adds the specified component to this entity.
      Entity Entity.add(Component[] comps)
      Adds the supplied components to this entity.
      Entity Entity.add(Component c1, Component c2, Component... rest)
      Adds the specified components to this entity.
      Entity Entity.add(Component c1, Component c2, Component... rest)
      Adds the specified components to this entity.
      boolean Entity.has(Component comp)
      Returns true if this entity has the component comp, false otherwise.
      Entity Entity.remove(Component comp)
      Removes the specified component from this entity.
